alert.note: Alert for Habersham; Rabun (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 07 at 2:40PM EDT until October 08 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 10 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Portions of the mountains and foothills of northeast Georgia and western North Carolina. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 10 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Frost will be especially prevalent in sheltered areas where winds will die off earliest in the night. This includes many valleys and low spots. Isolated locations may see freezing temperatures as well.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
